content:
I think it would be good to collect abstract todos which we have solve before we able to stu publish. My current list:

  • fix all our slicings
  • complete the work on CodeSystems
  • finish all missing ValueSet bindings
  • fix all issues to enable instance validation using our profiles
maybe use Jira for these tasks, to prepare us for when it replaces gforge?
great idea. Creating the tasks right now.
Is this to-dos or is this proposed changes to artifacts? The latter need to be in gForge

I see them as abstract todos/reminders. We will create GF issues for the actual actions.
As most of this are technical corrections/extensions we don't have to vote on them right? I once filed a tracker about bugs in java models in core which got auto-approved. But i don't see this option in my Gforge view
